title: Send 'We Miss You' Email
description: The marketing system needs to send a re-engagement email to customers who have not made a purchase in the last six months.

tasks.description: A system job identifies all customers with no purchases in the last 180 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of lapsed customers is generated.

tasks.description: The system sends them a 'We Miss You!' email that includes a special discount to encourage them to return.
tasks.expected_outcome: A targeted campaign is sent to win back lapsed customers.

tasks.description: The system tracks which of these customers use the discount to measure the campaign's effectiveness.
tasks.expected_outcome: The ROI of the win-back campaign can be calculated.
